Activity: Log in, check emails. Follow up on any pending issues from the week. Prepare for the weekly team meeting.
Attend weekly team meeting.  Present a summary of the testing progress for the week, highlighting any major successes or challenges faced. Reiterate the need for clear QA goals for future sprints.
Address any action items from the team meeting. Finalize documentation for all tests performed this week.
Lunch Break. Time for a longer break to recharge.
Depending on the status of the project, begin testing the UI/UX elements. Ensure all buttons and menus are functioning correctly. Evaluate the user experience and identify any areas for improvement.
Document all bugs or issues found related to UI/UX elements in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed feedback to @uiux-1 (UI/UX Designer).
Prepare a final summary report of all testing activities for the week.  Submit the report to @prod-1 and @ldes-1. Cleanup workspace and prepare for the weekend.
